content.query:
-----------------------
---External Resources--
-----------------------

-------------------------
---External Data Source--
-------------------------


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE silver_source
WITH 
(
    LOCATION = 'https://retail0dlake.blob.core.windows.net/silver',
    CREDENTIAL = sv_cred
);



CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE gold_source
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://retail0dlake.blob.core.windows.net/gold',
    CREDENTIAL = sv_cred
)


-------------------------
---External File Format--
-------------------------


CREATE EXTERNAL file FORMAT parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
)
